results.title: Sir Anthony Hopkins has described his work in Marvel's Thor films as "pointless acting".
results.subtitle: BBC
results.body: "If you're sitting in front of a green screen, it's pointless acting it," Sir Anthony told the New Yorker. "They put me in armour; they shoved a beard on me," he told the magazine.

results.title: When Anthony Hopkins was ready to quit acting until Thor and Odin came his way: I was gonna give it up
results.subtitle: The Indian Express
results.body: On the occasion of celebrated actor Anthony Hopkins' birthday, we revisit the time when he wanted to quit acting, but didn't, all thanks to the 2011 Marvel release Thor.

results.title: Anthony Hopkins Shares Delightful Throwback Video From Thor: Ragnarok Set
results.subtitle: Comicbook
results.body: Fun memories on set of Thor... Happy Saturday everyone, he wrote. Hopkins credited Juan Miguel for taking the video. Many fans were quick to comment on Hopkins' post, clearly loving the behind-the-scenes fun.

results.title: Mel Gibson Could Have Played Odin In The Thor Movies
results.subtitle: Gizmodo
results.body: Considering how much controversy has surrounded Mel Gibson, it’s still odd how often he gets linked to the Marvel Cinematic Universe. Rumours have swirled about him as an Avenger, a director and now Gibson himself confirmed a totally different connection — to the role of Thors father.

results.title: First Image of Odin and Loki from THOR; Marvel Post-Converting THOR and CAPTAIN AMERICA into 3D
results.subtitle: collider
results.body: We have our first look at Odin and Loki from THOR, plus the announcement that Marvel is post-converting both THOR and CAPTAIN AMERICA to 3D.

results.title: Sir Anthony Hopkins Cast as Odin in Thor!?
results.subtitle: ScreenRant
results.body: I guess those rumors of Brian Blessed playing Odin in Marvel Studios' upcoming Thor movie aren't coming to fruition. Who needs him when you have a knighted Oscar winner in Sir Anthony Hopkins!
